actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Blind Rehabilitation Center in the Hines Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Chicago, Illinois, as the "John Malamazian Blind Rehabilitation Center".

summary.text: Designates the Blind Rehabilitation Center in the Hines Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Chicago, Illinois, as the John Malamazian Blind Rehabilitation Center.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Blind Rehabilitation Center in the Hines Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Chicago, Illinois, as the "John Malamazian Blind Rehabilitation Center".
